resources.string: CREATE TABLE wordLists ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, description TEXT, mainLanguageId NUMERIC, foreignLanguageId NUMERIC, updatedAt TEXT );
CREATE TABLE authenticate ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, token TEXT, user_id INTEGER, created_at TEXT, updated_at TEXT );
CREATE TABLE profile ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, created_at TEXT, email TEXT, login TEXT, updated_at TEXT, user_type TEXT );
